Dario Teixeira

January 2010

Abstract

Inline elements

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Donec quam felis, ultricies nec, pellentesque eu, pretium quis, sem. Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae, eleifend ac, enim. Aliquam lorem ante, dapibus in, viverra quis, feugiat a, tellus. Phasellus viverra nulla ut metus varius laoreet. Quisque rutrum. Aenean imperdiet. Etiam ultricies nisi vel augue. Curabitur ullamcorper ultricies nisi.

Here we have examples of text in bold and emphasised and monospaced and in small-caps and with superscripts and subscripts. You may also correct perfectbroken text. Here is a link to section number 1 or smartly, Section 1. And here is a link to that same section. You can also link to Tip #1, or smarly Tip #1, or a link to that same tip. The bibliography is at the end[1][2][3]. There is also(1) a list(2) of notes(3).

type 'a tree =
    | Leaf
    | Node of 'a * 'a tree * 'a tree


let rec count = function
    | Leaf                     -> 0
    | Node (node, left, right) -> 1 + (count left) + (count right);;

Phasellus viverra nulla ut metus varius laoreet. Quisque rutrum. Aenean imperdiet. Etiam ultricies nisi vel augue. Curabitur ullamcorper ultricies nisi. 



type 'a tree =
    | Leaf
    | Node of 'a * 'a tree * 'a tree


let rec count = function
    | Leaf		       -> 0
    | Node (node, left, right) -> 1 + (count left) + (count right);;

Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae, eleifend ac, enim. Aliquam lorem ante, dapibus in, viverra quis, feugiat a, tellus. Phasellus viverra nulla ut metus varius laoreet. Quisque rutrum. Aenean imperdiet. Etiam ultricies nisi vel augue. Curabitur ullamcorper ultricies nisi.

type 'a tree =
    | Leaf
    | Node of 'a * 'a tree * 'a tree


let rec count = function
    | Leaf                     -> 0
    | Node (node, left, right) -> 1 + (count left) + (count right);;
